pages.title: HUAJI Ore
pages.text: Minerals that accumulate high concentrations of HUAJI particles form in the 5 to 15 layers of the main world, often accompanied by glowstone.

pages.title: HUAJI Star Block
pages.text: HUAJI Star compression block, perhaps the beautiful building materials of the rich?
